### Data Lake:

**Definition:** Centralized repository for all data types.

### Characteristics:
- Raw data storage
- Schema-on-read
- Any format
- Low cost storage

### Comparison:

| Aspect | Lake | Warehouse |
|--------|------|----------|
| Schema | On-read | On-write |
| Data | Raw | Processed |
| Users | Data scientists | Analysts |
| Cost | Lower | Higher |

### Lakehouse:

**Definition:** Combines lake and warehouse.

### Features:
- ACID transactions
- Schema enforcement
- BI support
- Open formats

### Tools: Delta Lake, Iceberg

### Common Zones:

| Zone | Data |
|------|------|
| **Raw/Bronze** | Original data |
| **Cleaned/Silver** | Validated, cleaned |
| **Curated/Gold** | Business-ready |

### Governance Needs:

| Area | Purpose |
|------|--------|
| Catalog | Find data |
| Access control | Security |
| Quality | Trust data |
| Lineage | Track origin |

### Cloud Services:

| Cloud | Service |
|-------|--------|
| AWS | S3 + Lake Formation |
| Azure | ADLS Gen2 |
| GCP | Cloud Storage + Dataproc |

### All support object storage + compute
